sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnproxyloginfo ( PROXY_ID , clnt_ip , clnt_port , conect_time , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id ) VALUES ( #proxyId# , #clntIp# , #clntPort# , #conectTime# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnproxyloginfo SET proxy_id = #proxyId# , clnt_ip = #clntIp# , clnt_port = #clntPort# , conect_time = #conectTime# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , log_id = #logId# WHERE proxy_id = #proxyId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnproxyloginfo WHERE proxy_id = #proxyId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT proxy_id , clnt_ip , clnt_port , conect_time , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM comtnproxyloginfo WHERE proxy_id = #proxyId# AND log_id = #logId#

SELECT proxy_id , clnt_ip , clnt_port , conect_time , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM comtnproxyloginfo WHERE 1=1
proxy_id = #searchKeyword#
clnt_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY proxy_id DESC , log_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnproxyloginfo WHERE 1=1
proxy_id = #searchKeyword#
clnt_ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
